mapper.select: select realname from sys_user where id = #{userId}
select exam_id from smart_people where person_id = #{userId}
select IFNULL(exam_grade,-1) as exam_grade from smart_people where exam_id = #{examId} and person_id = #{userId}

SELECT sp.person_name,depart_name as deptName, IFNULL(sp.exam_grade,-1) as exam_grade,is_mark FROM smart_exam_information se LEFT JOIN smart_people sp ON se.id = sp.exam_id LEFT JOIN smart_paper p ON p.id = se.paper_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = sp.person_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd on sd.id = u.depart_id WHERE se.paper_id = #{examId} order by exam_grade desc
mapper.update: update smart_people set exam_grade = #{grade},submit_time = #{date} where exam_id = #{examId} and person_id = #{userId}

update smart_people sp set sp.exam_grade = #{grade}, sp.is_finish = #{isFinish}, sp.inquirer_id = #{inquirerId}, sp.satisfaction = #{satisfaction}, sp.is_report = #{isReport}, where sp.exam_id = #{examId} and sp.person_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select su.id as userId,su.realname,su.depart_id,su.phone,svh.idnumber from sys_user su left join smart_village_home svh on su.home_code = svh.home_code where su.home_code = #{homeCode} order by rand() limit 1

select p.person_id as userId,su.realname,su.depart_id,d.depart_name,su.phone,su.phone, svh.idnumber,su1.realname as hostName,p.is_finish from smart_paper sp left join smart_people p on sp.id = p.exam_id left join sys_user su on su.id = p.person_id left join smart_village_home svh on su.home_code = svh.home_code left join sys_user su1 on su1.idnumber = svh.idnumber left join sys_depart d on d.id = su.depart_id where sp.del_flag = 0 and sp.paper_type = '3' and sp.id=#{paperId} and su.depart_id=#{departId} order by p.create_time
select sp.is_finish from smart_people sp where sp.exam_id = #{examId} and sp.person_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id as userId,u1.realname as hostName,svh.idnumber,u.depart_id,depart_name,u.realname,is_finish,is_mark,is_report,satisfaction FROM smart_people sp LEFT JOIN smart_paper p ON p.id = sp.exam_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = sp.person_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart d on d.id = u.depart_id LEFT JOIN smart_village_home svh on u.home_code = svh.home_code LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 on u1.idnumber = svh.idnumber WHERE sp.exam_id = #{examId} and u.depart_id = #{departId} order by sp.create_time desc
